data.message: Hello my name is Lily and I am from Bulgaria listen to your music for years and admire you! I know your fans and even my girlfriends are yours paraffin ! :D Even rap but do not know to develop me if I laugh I do not know if I can do .Each year when your birthday I celebrate this day because I am happy and it is here to tell you happy birthday and I now celebrate their good Iscar pretty good but on the same day and was a case which was very sorry and it on your birthday was bad but the day went well ...I want to know I love you very much and you are inspired and would love at least I like comments ... :D <3
